pkgmetadata.longdescription: # django-handleref[![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/django-handleref.svg?maxAge=3600)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/django-handleref)[![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/django-handleref.svg?maxAge=600)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/django-handleref)[![Tests](https://github.com/20c/django-handleref/workflows/tests/badge.svg)](https://github.com/20c/django-handleref)[![Codecov](https://img.shields.io/codecov/c/github/20c/django-handleref/master.svg?maxAge=3600)](https://codecov.io/github/20c/django-handleref)Track when an object was created or changed and allow querying based on time and versioning (w/ `django-reversion` support)### LicenseCopyright 2015-2023 20C, LLCLicensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");you may not use this software except in compliance with the License.You may obtain a copy of the License at http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, softwaredistributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.See the License for the specific language governing permissions andlimitations under the License.
